description:
Do you want to learn how to easily build a beautiful and functional website as a beginner? 

Do you want to master the hottest trend in web design industry right now - Wordpress? 

Do you want to know how to make your website look awesome on any device?

This course takes you from no knowledge about web design to being able to easily create beautiful,functional and responsive websites.

Examples of Websites you can Make:

  • Business Site
  • Blog
  • News Site
  • Personal Site
  • Resume Site
  • Online Portfolio
title: Build a Website for Beginners - 2016
